channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-8240] VectorColumnAssignFactory throws "Incompatible Bytes vector column and primitive category VARCHAR"
item.summary: VectorColumnAssignFactory throws "Incompatible Bytes vector column and primitive category VARCHAR"

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

customfieldvalues.customfieldvalue: HIVE-8240: VectorColumnAssignFactory support for VARCHAR (Matt McCline, via Gopal V)
